summary: The script launches a Textual terminal UI that lets the user set a servo motor's target angle via input controls and continuously displays the current position reported by an attached quadrature encoder, interfacing with the hardware through defined GPIO pins.
business_intent: Provide a convenient interactive tool for developers and engineers to test, calibrate, and debug servo and encoder hardware in real time, facilitating rapid prototyping and troubleshooting without writing custom code each time.
